South Atlantic League MACON BRAVES--Announced RHP Winston Abreu has been promoted to Richmond of the International League. Activated LHP Dan Kelly from the injured list.
National Basketball Association ATLANTA HAWKS--Named Wally Blase trainer and Tom Smith assistant trainer-equipment manager. LOS ANGELES LAKERS--Signed G Isaiah Rider.

National Football League GREEN BAY PACKERS--Waived KR-WR Chris Coleman. NEW YORK GIANTS--Announced they have been awarded CB Ramos McDonald off waivers from San Francisco. Placed RB Sean Bennett on injured reserve. PHILADELPHIA EAGLES--Signed S Tim Hauck to a one-year contract. Released CB Mark Tate. Traded PR Allen Rossum to the Green Bay Packers for an undisclosed draft pick.
Canadian Football League TORONTO ARGONAUTS--Announced the resignation of John Huard, coach.
National Hockey League MINNESOTA WILD--Named Jock Callander assistant coach of Cleveland of the IHL. WASHINGTON CAPITALS--Signed RW Stephane Richer to a one-year contract.
International Hockey League GRAND RAPIDS GRIFFINS--Signed D Mike Crowley.
East Coast Hockey League BATON ROUGE KINGFISH--Signed G Paxton Schafer and D Dane Litke.
Central Hockey League COLUMBUS COTTONMOUTHS--Signed C Jerome Bechard and G Francis Ouellette.
United Hockey League ASHVILLE SMOKE--Signed D Brett Colborne.

ARMY--Named Jason Miller men's assistant lacrosse coach. BRADLEY--Named Bridget Setter women's basketball administrative assistant. BROWN--Named Liz Robertshaw women's assistant lacrosse coach. COLLEGE OF NEW JERSEY--Named Scott Dicheck men's and women's tennis coach. HOLY CROSS--Named Tina McDavitt women's assistant field hockey coach. STANFROD--Named Michele Uhlfelder women's lacrosse coach. ST. JOSEPH'S, PA.--Named Sharon Manning women's assistant basketball coach. VASSAR--Named Jane Parker men's and women's squash coach.
